subtests.name: If new effect is null and old effect is not null the animation becomes finish-pending
If animation has a pending pause task, reschedule that task to run as soon as animation is ready.
If animation has a pending play task, reschedule that task to run as soon as animation is ready to play new effect.
The pending play task should be rescheduled even after temporarily setting the effect to null
When setting the effect of an animation to the effect of an existing animation, the existing animation's target effect should be set to null.
After setting the target effect of animation to the target effect of an existing animation, the target effect's timing is updated to reflect the current time of the new animation.
Setting the target effect to null causes a pending playback rate to be applied
